import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from "react" import {useGlobalContext} from "../context" import { useAuthUser } from "react-auth-kit" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" const NavBar = () => { const {handleLogout,fetchUser} = useGlobalContext() const auth = useAuthUser() useEffect(()=>{ fetchUser(`/get-user/${auth().username}`) },[]) const navItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Home", path: "/dashboard", icon: "home" }, { id: 2, name: "Add Student", path: "/addstudent", icon: "plus-circle" }, { id: 3, name: "Student Stats", path: "/stats", icon: "chart-pie" }, ] return (
{navItems.map((item)=>( {item.name} ))}
{/*
{auth().username}
Log Out
*/}

You can insert any type of content within the dropdown menu.

) } export default NavBar
